channel.title: [Class Suggestions] Cheesy Edition : Feauturing , the Agent , The Priest , and the Archer
channel.description:
> The Agent (Blue Dragon Social)
DAY ABILITIES: **Watchful Eye** See who the Unseen/ Cult visit. Cannot be used until Night 2. (3 uses)
**Hearing Ear** Listen in on the Unseen/Cult's conversation tonight. (2 uses)
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Spy** Hear whispers to and from a certain player. Cannot target the king. (Infinite Uses)
**Follow** You will be able to see what happen to your player this night and the next day. (Infinite Uses)
Goal:BD
> The Traitor (Unseen Social)
DAY ABILITIES: **Expose** Reveal to the Unseen who the Prince jails tonight. (3 uses)
**Listen In** You will be able to hear the Prince's conversation tonight. (2 uses)
NIGHT ABILITIES **Silence** Prevent a player from speaking tommorow. (Infinte Uses)
Goal : Unseen
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> The Priest (BD Social)
Priest: (Magic) (Unique)
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Channeling** Choose a dead Blue Dragon. They will be able to speak the following day. (4 uses)
**Blessing** Choose a dead player and find out how they died. (Infinite Uses)
Goal : BD
> Soulcatcher - Unseen Social
PASSIVES: **Dark Words** While the Soulcatacher is alive , dead Unseen members can talk to living ones.
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Catch Soul** Choose a player. If they die , they cannot talk to a Psychic, or be revived by a Physician. (3 uses)
**False Truth** Choose a dead player. You can pretend to speak as them if you right-click their name before you type your message the following day. (4 uses)
Goal:Unseen
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Archer (BD Killer)
DAY ABILITIES: **Sharpshot** Kill a player in the day. If they are Blue Dragon , you will commit suicide this night. (Infinite Uses)
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Last Breath** Choose a player. When you die , they will be attacked. (Infinite Uses)
> Ranger (Unseen Killer) yes u read that rite
DAY ABILITIES **Sharpshot:** Kill a player in the day, taking the use of of the Assasin's 2-for-1. (1 use)
NIGHT ABILITIES: **Ranged Advantage** The Assasin will not need to visit his target to kill them. (3 uses)
Im sleepy , ill tidy this up soon i guess
Changelog: 9/12/18 Tidied up a Bit 9/12/18 Changed False Truth description- "click" to "right-click"
